recommendations.recommendation: Slow-changing patterns may benefit from larger windows (20s-30s)
Fast-changing patterns may benefit from smaller windows (5s)

adaptiveWindowSizing.name: Adaptive Window Sizing
adaptiveWindowSizing.recommendation: Consider adaptive window sizing based on note frequency
